title: Prudential Financial breached in data theft cyberattack
description: Prudential Financial has disclosed that its network was breached last week, with the attackers stealing employee and contractor data before being blocked from compromised systems one day later. [...]

title: Hackers used new Windows Defender zero-day to drop DarkMe malware
description: Microsoft has patched today a Windows Defender SmartScreen zero-day exploited in the wild by a financially motivated threat group to deploy the DarkMe remote access trojan (RAT). [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5034763 update released with new fixes, changes
description: Microsoft has released the KB5034763 cumulative update for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 10 22H2, which includes a small number of changes, including the continued rollout of changes to comply with Europe's Digital Markets Act (DMA). [...]

title: 200,000 Facebook Marketplace user records leaked on hacking forum
description: A threat actor leaked 200,000 records on a hacker forum, claiming they contained the mobile phone numbers, email addresses, and other personal information of Facebook Marketplace users. [...]

title: Integris Health says data breach impacts 2.4 million patients
description: Integris Health has reported to U.S. authorities that the data breach it suffered last November exposed personal information belonging to almost 2.4 million people. [...]

title: Microsoft February 2024 Patch Tuesday fixes 2 zero-days, 73 flaws
description: Today is Microsoft's February 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 73 flaws and two actively exploited zero-days. [...]

title: Microsoft February 2024 Patch Tuesday fixes 2 zero-days, 74 flaws
description: Today is Microsoft's February 2024 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for 74 flaws and two actively exploited zero-days. [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5034765 update released with Start Menu fixes
description: Microsoft has released the KB5034765 cumulative update for Windows versions 23H2 and 22H2 to fix several bugs in the OS, including an issue that causes problems with the Start menu. [...]

title: Hackers steal $290 million in crypto from PlayDapp gaming platform
description: Hackers are believed to have used a stolen private key to mint and steal over $290 million in PLA tokens, a cryptocurrency used within the PlayDapp ecosystem. [...]

title: Bumblebee malware attacks are back after 4-month break
description: The Bumblebee malware has returned after a four-month vacation, targeting thousands of organizations in the United States in phishing campaigns. [...]

title: 5 Steps to Improve Your Security Posture in Microsoft Teams
description: Microsoft Teams is susceptible to a growing number of cybersecurity threats as its massive user base is an attractive target for cybercriminals. Learn more from Adaptive Shield on how to increase your Microsoft Teams security posture. [...]
